remarks: A continuous function from a connected topology with one point in a clopen set must lie entirely within the set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Feb-2015.)
statement:
concn.x $e |- X = U. J $.
concn.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. Con ) $.
concn.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
concn.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. K ) $.
concn.c $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( Clsd ` K ) ) $.
concn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
concn.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) e. U ) $.
concn $p |- ( ph -> F : X --> U ) $.
